entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Grand Étang
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:29 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grand Étang 6:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Temperature: -0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -3.8°C
Wind: WSW 34 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero except near minus 5 over the Highlands.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Risk of snow squalls late this evening and overnight. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm over the Highlands. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near zero except near minus 5 over the Highlands. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon except minus 8 over the Highlands.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon except minus 8 over the Highlands. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5 except minus 10 inland.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5 except minus 10 inland. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
